title: Strategies for Promoting Higher-Order Thinking Through Online Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning environments and foundational knowledge in social studies
context.additional_context: Strengthening online instructional design competencies for solving social sector practical problems targeting current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design a case analysis project in the social domain using web-based tools.
Learners can perform knowledge construction activities by incorporating peer feedback in online discussion forums.
Learners can simulate solutions to social issues using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
